File

Class Workbook

  • java.lang.Object
    • File.Workbook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Workbook

    public class Workbook
extends java.lang.Object
implements Workbook
    The class for the Workbook. A workbook may contain several Sheets. A workbook can be bound to a File in the system.
    Author:
    Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling, Maarten Flikkema
